title: First Come Twins
description: Photojournalist Noah Bennett has been running from himself forever. Covering war zones around the world has kept him away from his mistakes and, more important, from Sophie Rousseau, his high school sweetheart. But he's never forgotten her.He's returned to idyllic Mirabelle Island to heal, to finish his latest bookâ€¦and to face Sophie again.Months after Noah escaped the island for college, Sophie married his older brother. Now a widow with teenage twins, Sophie will do whatever it takes to speed Noah's recovery and get him off her island.Before the only man she ever loved breaks her heart again.
author: Helen Brenna
